title: Championship ashe
body: Just a question. if i unlock "championship ashe border and icon" or "Golden championship ahse chroma and ward" with the worlds tokens, does it unlock the championship ashe skin too??? or do i have to buy the skin seperately??

replies.body: You'll need to buy the skin itself separately!
You need to buy the skin separately.
Thanks a lot! planned to get the skin, but just didn't want to waste money if i were gonna get it for free anyway, so thanks a lot for your answers :D
